name: Android Vector
description:
Update 1 - 

Added a couple new tracks, attempted to fix racing physics so it accounts for proper G forces of turns making breaking more important. 

Android vector is a racing demo i've been working on over the past 7-8 days. 

It uses wasd controls, w is accelerate, s is break, d right, a left.

A tip would be to slow down at the apex of the turn, and then hammer the throttle out of the turn.  

I hope to continue working on it. Add some more tracks, and other cool features. 

Also heckin cool vibing beats and sound effects are on their way. 

Side note, the position counter doesn't seem to update on the fly properly. That will be fixed. It seems to work properly when the race is complete.
